## Natural history notes

The Little Ironweed (Cyanthillium cinereum)  is a species of perennial plants. The species is native to tropical Africa and to tropical Asia and has become naturalized in the US State of Florida. It has been used for smoking cessation in Thailand and other countries, and as relief for the common cold. It is a special medicinal plant used in Ayurveda, helping boost the body's immune system.
